title: Savoring Oregonâ€™s Wine Country, No Driving Required
description: In the Willamette Valley, public transportation takes you to McMinnville, where you can walk to one, or all, of its nearly 20 tasting rooms.
dc:creator: Elaine Glusac
media:credit: George Barberis for The New York Times
media:description: The Granary District in McMinnville, Ore., has a mix of wineries, breweries and restaurants.
